author: timbeiko
content: ICYMI, it seems like most block explorers are *not* reporting the same supply (https://twitter.com/factcheckmypost/status/1291863378793828359, https://twitter.com/zackvoell/status/1291876817327005698). This is embarrassing IMO and I wonder if we should try and get clients to implement a `getSupplyAtBlock` endpoint that we could write reference tests for to make sure it is consistent. Obviously the state root would be different if clients had different account balances, but having an easy way to expose it would remove the need to write scripts on top of the clients.
